scripts.lint: find ./trek -name '*.coffee' -exec coffeelint {} -f coffeelint.conf \; && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs static/js/trek.js && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs static/js/trek/*.js
scripts.todo: grep -A 5 -r TODO trek/*; grep -A 5 -r TODO static/*; grep -A 5 -r TODO test/*; grep -A 5 -r TODO views/*
